name: Golf Card Game HD
description:
Golf Card Game

** I have been waiting for someone to make this game for the iPad and iPhone. Great game everyone should download it.

** Great app. This golf game has just the right amount of strategy and luck to keep me interested. A full game takes about 10 minutes so it's a great way to pass the time. You will like this one!

** This games really fun!!!

** This is pretty fun to play!

** Fun game! I have zero issues and very happy with my purchase!

** An excellent, fun and original game.

A card game for all ages. Whether you're a 4 year old girl or a 80 year old man, this game is easy to learn. Yet it involves some decisions to challenge the most competitive of players. You can play against the computer or up to 3 other friends over wifi or bluetooth.

The game of golf is a simple but fun 4 card game where the lowest score wins the hole.

Score as few points as possible on each hole. The lowest score of each hole wins the hole and gets a point. The player with the most points after 9 holes wins the game.

* View scorecard with both Match play and Stroke play totals
* Share the scorecard with your friends and family.
* Tap hole flag to view scorecard at any time
* "Play again" option after round is over

Please send feedback or requests to golfcardgame@spiralinnovations.com.

Enjoy!
